mdRecord.dcterms:title: Parc de la Villette, general view

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Canal de l'Ourcq, Galerie de l'Ourcq and Folie du Canal (N5)

The Parc de la Villette is the third-largest park in Paris, 55.5 hectares (137 acres) in area, located at the northeastern edge of the city in the 19th arrondissement. The park houses one of the largest concentration of cultural venues in Paris, including the Cité des Sciences et de l'Industrie (City of Science and Industry, Europe's largest science museum), three major concert venues, and the prestigious Conservatoire de Paris. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parc_de_la_Villette [work]
